articles.author: Ajdina Halilovic
articles.description:
How do memories last a lifetime when the molecules that form them turn over within days, weeks or months? An interaction between two proteins points to a molecular basis for memory.            
The post The Molecular Bond That Helps Secure Your Memories first appeared on Quanta Magazine
articles.title: The Molecular Bond That Helps Secure Your Memories
